PHRASE.LANG: The sport of kings. Genuine imitation horses race around a state of the art electronic track, while you bet on which two horses will come in first and second! Start off with a coin or two to learn and eventually you will be a pro, winning tons of coins from your favorite horse combinations! Up to 12 players can play at once. Payoffs go from 2 for 1 to 200 for 1. It comes with 300 coins. Coins can also be purchased separately. [#Legal]

Le sport des rois. Chevaux imitation d'origine la course à l'électronique avancée, tandis que vous pariez sur deux chevaux qui viendra en premier et le deuxième! Commencez avec une pièce de monnaie ou deux à apprendre et vous finirez par être un pro, gagner des tonnes de pièces de monnaie de vos combinaisons de chevaux préférés! Jusqu'à 12 joueurs peuvent jouer. Gains vont de 2 pour 1 à 200 pour 1. [#Legal]

The sport of kings. Genuine imitation horses race around a state of the art electronic track, while you bet on which two horses will come in first and second! Start off with a coin or two to learn and eventually you will be a pro, winning tons of coins from your favorite horse combinations! Up to 12 players can play at once. Payoffs go from 2 for 1 to 200 for 1. It comes with 300 coins. Coins can also be purchased separately. [#Legal]
